DOC.brief_summary: The ultimate goal facilitate delivery empirically support treatment ( ESTs ) mental disorder improve client mental health outcome . Toward end , Phase II SBIR proposal seek complete development test PracticeGround , comprehensive software system design integrate electronic health record , contain multiple method train clinician ESTs deliver ESTs client , continuous progress monitoring client outcome , clinical support tool guide clinician client delivery necessary EST . The investigator conduct 18-week randomized control trial ( N=80 ) compare PracticeGround ( n=40 ) care-as-usual ( n=40 ) depress outpatient client . PracticeGround clinicians full access software . Study clinicians client assess every six week ( baseline , 6 , 12 , 18 week ) . To ensure generalizability finding , investigator control natural therapy variation ( e.g. , session frequency , medication use , etc. ) . Primary outcome include : depression , psychological distress , treatment satisfaction ( client clinician ) , treatment drop . Secondary clinician outcome include : extent PracticeGround use client across clinician ' caseload .
DOC.brief_title: PracticeGround : Transforming Training Delivery Mental Health EBPs
DOC.criteria: Meets DSMIV criterion MDD and/or DD Obtains score 11 great PHQ9 Currently receive psychosocial treatment depression studyparticipant clinician Paymenteligible receive least 12 week additional psychosocial treatment Current diagnosis bipolar disorder another psychotic disorder Active mania Current diagnosis alcohol and/or drug dependence At imminent risk suicide ( deemed clinician ) .
